text: Bioggio is a municipality of the district of Lugano, in the canton of Ticino in Switzerland. Bioggio was created on 4 April 2004 from the merger of Bosco Luganese and Cimo. On 20 April 2008, Iseo used to be part of the municipality of Bioggio. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Municipalities in Lugano
title: Bioggio
